description: Configuration schema for SnapsInAZfs snapshot templates

$comments.description: Comments about this document. Not used in configuration validation.

SnapshotTiming.description: The times at which the corresponding snapshot periods will be taken.

FrequentPeriod.description: The time, in minutes, between 'frequent' snapshots. Should be a whole number factor of 60.

HourlyMinute.description: The minute of the hour to take hourly snapshots. 0 means top of the hour.

DailyTime.description: The time of day at which to take daily snapshots. Default is 00:00

WeeklyDay.description: The day a weekly snapshot will be taken on, as a 0-indexed day of the week, with 0 being Sunday.
WeeklyDay.$comment: In US locale rules, the default value '1' is Monday

WeeklyTime.description: The time of day at which to take weekly snapshots.

MonthlyDay.description: The 1-indexed day of the month on which to take monthly snapshots.
MonthlyDay.$comment: If set to 30 or 31, and the current month does not have 30 or 31 days, snapshot will be taken on the last day of the month (28 or 29 for February, for example). Default is 1.

MonthlyTime.description: The time of day at which to take monthly snapshots. Must be parseable as a 24-hour time in the format HH:mm or HH:mm:ss. Ability to use seconds depends on your scheduling mechanism.

YearlyMonth.description: The month of the year in which to take yearly snapshots.

YearlyDay.description: The 1-indexed day of the month on which to take monthly snapshots.
YearlyDay.$comment: If set to 30 or 31, and the month specified in DailyMonth does not have 30 or 31 days, snapshot will be taken on the last day of the month (28 or 29 for February, for example). Default is 1

YearlyTime.description: The time of day at which to take yearly snapshots.

Formatting.description: Configuration section for configurable formatting options for output, naming, etc.

ComponentSeparator.description: The string used for separating the prefix, timestamp, and suffix components of a snapshot name. Can be an empty string.

Prefix.description: The prefix component of all snapshot names.

TimestampFormatString.description: .net-style DateTimeOffset format string for the timestamp component of snapshot names.
TimestampFormatString.$comment: See the Microsoft documentation for DateTimeOffset.ToString() format strings. Note that backslash must be escaped for JSON and that the resulting string must be properly escaped for the ToString function.

FrequentSuffix.description: The suffix component of frequent snapshot names.

HourlySuffix.description: The suffix component of hourly snapshot names.

DailySuffix.description: The suffix component of daily snapshot names.

WeeklySuffix.description: The suffix component of weekly snapshot names.

MonthlySuffix.description: The suffix component of monthly snapshot names.

YearlySuffix.description: The suffix component of yearly snapshot names.

$comment: Note that we will not take snapshots for a given type if that type is set to 0 in SnapshotRetention, regardless of the autosnap setting. For example, if yearly = 0, we will not take yearly snapshots, even if we've defined a preferred time for yearlies and autosnap is on. If multiple snapshots are scheduled to be taken at the same time of day, they will be taken in order of shortest to longest period, so that a Yearly always contains Monthlies, Monthlies contain Weeklies, and so on.
